name: ADVentura - The Conqueror - Emperor Edition
additionalNotes: ADV Black The Conqueror is a cigar fit for a Conqueror and is another great offering from our friends at ADVentura! Appreciate the engaging flavor foreplay of dark, nutty chocolate with a hint of salt linger with the savory crescendo of caramel and cedar to the end. ADV Black The Conqueror utilizes a beautiful natural shade Ecuadorian wrapper, Indonesian binder and Dominican/Nicaraguan fillers.
